All Classes

Class Description
AABBCollided
A AABBCollided represents an non-rotatable YaegerEntity that can be collided with by a AABBCollider.
AABBCollider
A AABBCollider represents an YaegerEntity that can be collided with by a AABBCollided
AABBSideAwareCollided
A AABBSideAwareCollided represents an YaegerEntity that can be collided with by a AABBCollider and that is aware of which of its side the AABBCollider had collided with.
Activatable
Implementing Activatable denotes the Object can, and usually must, be activated before it can be used.
Anchorable  
AnchorPoint
An AnchorPoint denotes the point of an YaegerEntity which is being used for placement on the x,y-coordinate.
AnimationTimerFactory
An AnimationTimerFactory should be used to create instances of an AnimationTimer.
AnimationTimerHandler  
AnnotationProcessor
The AnnotationProcessor is responsible for processing Yaeger specific annotations.
AudioRepository
An AudioRepository provides a central repository for acquiring audio files.
BackgroundDelegate
A BackgroundDelegate follows the Delegate pattern and embraces Composition over Inheritence.
BackgroundFactory
A BackgroundFactory can be used to create instances of Background to be used as the background of a Pane.
Bounded
Implementing this interface exposes the Bounded.getNonTransformedBounds() method, which returns the bounds, aka Bounding Box, of this Entity.
BufferedMoveable  
CenteredShapeEntity<T extends javafx.scene.shape.Shape>
A CenteredShapeEntity is a special case of a ShapeEntity, based on a Shape of which the center is the reference point when placed on a Scene.
CircleEntity
A CircleEntity provides the option to use a drawable Circle as an YaegerEntity.
Clearable
Denote that this Object can be cleared.
CollisionDelegate
A CollisionDelegate handles all behavior related to Object collisions.
CollisionSide
A CollisionSide denotes the side of the AABBCollided with which the AABBCollider has collided.
ContinuousRotatable
When implementing this Interface, a YaegerEntity will acquire the behaviour to perform a rotation on each Game World update, and thus give the illusion of a continuous rotation.
Coordinate2D
A Coordinate2D is a 2D geometric point that represents a pair of coordinates.
Debugger
The Debugger is used to gather and show in game debug information.
DebugGridPaneFactory
A DebugGridPaneFactory should be used for creating instances of GridPane for use in the Debugger.
DebugLabelFactory
A value shown in the Debugger.
DefaultMotionApplier
A DefaultMotionApplier is an implementation of MotionApplier that does not abide the laws of Physics and only provides basis behaviour regarding speed and direction.
DependencyInjector
Implementing this interface states that this Object requires injection of dependencies.
Destroyable
Denote that this Object is Destroyable and hence ensures maximum Objects eligible for Garbage Collection.
DimensionsProvider
Implementing the DimensionsProvider interface exposes the DimensionsProvider.getWidth() and DimensionsProvider.getHeight() methods.
Direction
Convenience enum for setting the Direction.
DirectionProvider
A DirectionProvider exposes a method to acquire the direction.
DynamicCircleEntity
An DynamicCircleEntity extends all behaviour of a CircleEntity, but also implements the Updatable Interface.
DynamicEllipseEntity
An DynamicEllipseEntity extends all behaviour of a EllipseEntity, but also implements the Updatable Interface.
DynamicRectangleEntity
An DynamicRectangleEntity extends all behaviour of a RectangleEntity, but also implements the Updatable Interface.
DynamicScene
Instantiate a new DynamicScene.
DynamicSpriteEntity
A DynamicSpriteEntity extends all behaviour of a SpriteEntity, but also implements the Updatable Interface.
DynamicTextEntity
An DynamicTextEntity extends all behaviour of a TextEntity, but also implements the Updatable Interface.
Effectable
By implementing the interface Effectable, it is possible to applies various effects on a Node from a YaegerScene.
EllipseEntity
An EllipseEntity provides the option to use a drawable Ellipse as a YaegerEntity.
EntityCollection
An EntityCollection encapsulates all behaviour related to all instances of YaegerEntity that are part of a YaegerScene.
EntityCollectionFactory
A EntityCollectionFactory can be used to create instances of EntityCollection.
EntityCollectionStatistics
An EntityCollectionStatistics is a DTO (Data Transfer Object) that contains all current values from an EntityCollection.
EntityCollectionSupplier
Provide a EntityCollectionSupplier.getEntityCollection() that returns an instance of \.
EntityMotionInitBuffer
An EntityMotionInitBuffer is used to support the option to set the speed and direction of an YaegerEntity from the constructor.
EntityProcessor
When a YaegerEntity needs to be processed, in general meaning it should be passed as a parameter to a specific method, this functional interface can be used as the basis for a Lambda expression.
EntitySpawner
An EntitySpawner is the abstract superclass that should be extended to create an object that spawns a subclass of YaegerEntity.
EntitySpawnerContainer
When implementing this interface, the EntitySpawnerContainer.setupEntitySpawners() method needs to be implemented.
EntitySpawnerListProvider
Implementing the EntitySpawnerListProvider interface guarantees that a List of instances of EntitySpawner is available.
EntitySupplier
An EntitySupplier extends a ArrayList of instances of YaegerEntity.
EventInitiator<T extends javafx.event.Event>
By implementing the interface EventInitiator it is possible to register an EventHandler for a given EventType.
GameNode
Being a GameNode guarantees that a Node, if set, is accessible.
HanFont
Yaeger's interface to all font styles that are part of the HAN University of applied sciences house style.
HanFontStyle
The different styles that are available for the default HAN font.
ImageFactory
An ImageFactory should be used for creating instance of Image.
ImageRepository
An ImageRepository provides a central repository for acquiring sprites.
ImageViewFactory
An ImageViewFactory should be used for creating instance of ImageView.
Initializable
Stating an Object is Initializable exposes the init lifecycle hook.
KeyListener
A KeyListener is notified when the set of pressed keys changes.
KeyListenerDelegate
A KeyListenerDelegate follows the Delegate pattern and embraces Composition over Inheritence.
LocationUpdater
A LocationUpdater can calculate a new location.
MotionApplier
Base interface of all Objects that apply a motion to a subclass of YaegerEntity.
MotionModifier
A MotionModifier is capable of modifying a motion.
MouseButtonPressedListener
Being a MouseButtonPressedListener enables the YaegerEntity to be notified if a MouseButton has been clicked while the mouse pointer is on the YaegerEntity.
MouseButtonReleasedListener
Being a MouseButtonReleasedListener enables the YaegerEntity to be notified if a MouseButton has been released while the mouse pointer is on the YaegerEntity.
MouseEnterListener
Being a MouseEnterListener enables the YaegerEntity to be notified if the Mouse Cursor has entered the area defined by the BoundingBox of an YaegerEntity.
MouseExitListener
Being a MouseExitListener enables the YaegerEntity to be notified if the Mouse Cursor has exited the area defined by the BoundingBox of an YaegerEntity.
Moveable  
OnActivation
A method annotated with OnActivation will be automatically called by the AnnotationProcessor during activation of either an YaegerEntity or a YaegerScene.
OnPostActivation
A method annotated with OnActivation will be automatically called by the AnnotationProcessor after activation of either an YaegerEntity or a YaegerScene.
Placeable
A Placeable has a methods that can be used to place it at a different x,y-coordinates on the YaegerScene.
RectangleEntity
A RectangleEntity provides the option to use a drawable Rectangle as an YaegerEntity.
Removeable
A Removeable denotes an Object, most likely an YaegerEntity, that is eligible for removance from its parent.
Rotatable
Implementing the interface Rotatable will result in de availability of the Rotatable.setRotate(double) method.
RotationBuffer
A RotationBuffer is a simple data container, only used for storing the value of rotate, in case it is set before a Node is available.
SceneBorder  
SceneBorderCrossingWatcher
Implement this interface to be notified if the YaegerEntity crosses the boundary of the YaegerScene.
SceneBorderTouchingWatcher
Implement this interface to be notified if the YaegerEntity touches the boundary of the YaegerScene.
SceneChild
A SceneChild is part of a YaegerScene and has thus access to width and height of the YaegerScene it is part of.
SceneCollection
A SceneCollection contains all instances of YaegerScene that are part of a Game.
SceneCollectionFactory
A SceneCollectionFactory can be used to create instances of SceneCollection.
SceneFactory
A SceneFactory can be used to create instances of Scene.
ShapeEntity<T extends javafx.scene.shape.Shape>
The ShapeEntity is the abstract super class of all Entities that encapsulate a JavaFX Shape.
Size
A Size encapsulates the width and height.
SoundClip
A SoundClip encapsulates a mp3 audio file.
SpeedProvider
A SpeedProvider exposes a method to acquire the speed.
SplashScene
A Splash Screen, being an instance of YaegerScene that will be shown a given number of miliseconds at the start of a YaegerGame.
SplashScreenFactory
The factory to be used for creating instances of SplashScene.
SpriteAnimationDelegateFactory  
SpriteEntity
A SpriteEntity is a YaegerEntity that is represented by an Image.
StaticScene
A StaticScene is the abstract superclass of all scenes that do not require a Game Loop.
StatisticsObserver
A StatisticsObserver will function as the Observer from the Observable-pattern, for changes in the EntityCollectionStatistics.
SupplierProvider
Provide a SupplierProvider.getEntitySupplier() that returns an instance of EntitySupplier.
TextEntity
A TextEntity can be used to display a line of text on a YaegerScene.
TileFactory
The TileFactory should be used for creating instances of SpriteEntity that will be part of a TileMap.
TileMap
A TileMap encapsulate a two-dimensional map of SpriteEntity.
TileMapContainer
Implementing this interface exposes the TileMapContainer.addTileMap(TileMap) method.
TileMapListProvider
Implementing the TileMapListProvider interface guarantees that a List of instances of TileMap is available.
TimeableAnimationTimer
An AnimationTimer that calls its handle() method on the given interval, and not the default 60 times per second.
TimeableAnimationTimerHandler
A Functional Interface to be used for the handler of a AnimationTimer.
Timer
Abstract superclass of all timers that are available for both a YaegerScene and an YaegerEntity.
TimerContainer
When implementing this interface, the TimerContainer.setupTimers() method needs to be implemented.
TimerListProvider
Implementing the TimerListProvider interface guarantees that a List of instances of Timer is available.
Updatable
Implement this interface to be updated every cycle of the game loop.
UpdatableProvider
A method annotated with UpdatableProvider should return an Updatable and will automatically be called during activation of an YaegerEntity or YaegerScene to gathers all objects that contain an Updatable.update(long) method that should be called at each Game world update.
UpdateDelegator
An Updatable that delegates the update to an Updater.
UpdateExposer
The interface UpdateExposer can be applied to any dynamic YaegerEntity or YaegerScene.
Updater
An Updater contains a List of Updatable to which the update method will be delegated.
YaegerConfig
An encapsulation of the various configuration settings that can be applied to Yaeger at start up.
YaegerEntity
A YaegerEntity is the base class for all things that can be drawn on a YaegerScene.
YaegerGame
YaegerGame is the base class that must be extended to create a Yaeger game.
YaegerScene
A YaegerScene encapsulates a scene or level from a Yaeger Game.
YaegerStage
A YaegerStage encapsulates an JavaFX Stage.
